TopicTitle: The Royal Kerbal Military's Official Weaponry Showcase

Articles.Content:
Salutations, soldiers.

If you are here, you must be a member of the Royal Kerbal Military. If not, please leave now or join our ranks.

This is the Weaponry Showcase! Show your favourite mods or craft - you never know when you might get an upgrade!

Godspeed.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=5127.0

Pretty much and epic line of craft for any jobs you could ever need to solve.

PS: adding boats, landers, and large hoverships in the making.
Horrendously large otbital haulers on the way 8)

Ok First Attachment is the Ba 349 Natter, short range solid rocket interceptor !

the parachute is only cosmetic, to get the pilot IN.

Second is my all purpose lifter/orbiter/MÃ¼n shot/lander/sat-launcher, The Reaper Launcher

Third is the extent of the Reaper Launchers capacities; The MÃ¼nar Observation base A01 .. one of Many to come !

Top attachment is the 'Tick' medical transport/fragile cargo transport. Can\'t fly fast enough to damage cargo or persons

second is my 'Gigantor' Mid-air refueling plane. Its giant and carries fuel and is surprisingly gentle without SAS on.

GEKSAT-1 provides battlefield information to RKM soldiers by using extremely precise radar (~1.4m resolution) to locate enemy vehicles and track troop movement.

The first stage separates, along with the fairings

Stage two ignites, as seen in this somwhat sexy view

GEKSAT in a geostationary orbit. Systems are online and functioning properly.

Alignment with the ground is good. GEKSAT has reached full functionality

Ok First Attachment is the Ba 349 Natter, short range solid rocket interceptor !

the parachute is only cosmetic, to get the pilot IN.

Second is my all purpose lifter/orbiter/MÃ¼n shot/lander/sat-launcher, The Reaper Launcher

the bachem atter is my favorite of the crazy nazi rocket planes
